name: HighDensityLipoprotein
title: High Density Lipoprotein
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable term codes for High Density Lipoprotein (HDL) related codes results in blood including its ratio with Low Density Lipoprotein (LDL) and cholesterol.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood for HDL.),(Inclusion Criteria: HDL lab test, coded in LOINC, using the source of blood along with HDL and Cholesterol ratio.),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent HDL, as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
